name: Icarus-X: Tides of Fire
description: Blast your way through waves of enemies and bullets and defeat massive boss ships in this fast-paced vertical Shoot'em Up with a traditional Arcade Mode and an experimental Campaign Mode that borrows from the mechanics of ARPGs such as Diablo and Borderlands.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8/7/Vista/XP SP3 Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible dedicated graphic card with 512MB memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: When I first booted this up and I saw the auto-fire kick on, I figured this shmup wouldn't keep my attention long, but I've been pleasantly surprised. Some elegant RPG progression elements needed to advanced past challenging (but not impossible shmup-like) levels has kept me coming back for more. A decent varity of common and boss enemies, weapons, shields and powers gives this little game a good amount of depth. Recommended!
